DF_ARCHITECT.ReloadRequired_Content: A reload is required for your changes to go into effect.
DF_ARCHITECT.LayerShortcuts_Settings_Des: Shortcuts for switching between the canvas layers.
DF_ARCHITECT.LayerShortcuts_Settings_Qui: This Hotkey is for quickly swapping between two preset layers. Each time it is pressed, it will switch to the layer it is not on. If you are on a layer that is not included in this pair, you will be switched to Layer 1.
One of the two layers that will swap between when the Quick Swap hotkey is pressed.
The second of the two layers that will swap between when the Quick Swap hotkey is pressed.
DF_ARCHITECT.WallShortcuts_Settings_Desc: Hotkeys assigned to switch between the different wall types
DF_ARCHITECT.AltGridSnap_Setting_Enabled: Show the toggle button alternate grid snapping to the center of boxes instead of corners.
